h2_title: Where to use the Violet Hail (Key Item) in Black Myth: Wukong
content: The Violet Hail (Key Item) can be given to Daoist Mi in Petalfall Hamlet at Purple Cloud Mountain in The Webbed Hollow. Giving it to him will cause him to become hostile and unlock a boss fight, allowing you to progress through this area.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Violet_Hail_(Key_Item).md', within the main section titled 'Violet Hail (Key Item)', specifically from the subsection 'Where to use the Violet Hail (Key Item) in Black Myth: Wukong'.
The content is as follows:
The Violet Hail (Key Item) can be given to Daoist Mi in Petalfall Hamlet at Purple Cloud Mountain in The Webbed Hollow. Giving it to him will cause him to become hostile and unlock a boss fight, allowing you to progress through this area.
